Title: Lot 2 - Light Commercial Vehicles (LCV's) up to 7.5t GVW
Description: Tender for the Supply and Delivery of Light Commercial Vehicles using the Hertfordshire County Council Vehicle Purchase Framework HCCPSJB/VEHICLES/2015. The tender was for the supply of 9 x 3.5Ton tippers. The tender was broken down into two Lots. The closing date for submissions was 11 July 2018. Submissions were evaluated against set criteria. The award for the supply  of Lot 1 was awarded to Evans Halshaw Ltd and Lot 2 was awarded to RRG Peugeot Ltd

Title: Supply and Delivery of 3500 GVW Caged Tipper Bodied Vehicle
Description:
Wyre Forest District Council is looking for a contractor to supply and deliver a 3500 GVW Caged tipper bodied vehicle.
The Council currently operate a number of 3,500kg Tipper Bodied Vehicles. The vehicles have been in use since 2008 and used daily. Routine maintenance is carried out by the garage based at the Green Street depot. The vehicles are used by all sections to deliver their service requirements, which include movement of staff, supplies and equipment. They are now at the end of there useful life and we are looking to replace with a vehicle that can  operated for longer service periods whilst also delivering better fuel economy and payload.
The deadline for submissions to Pro-Contract Due North is 2pm Friday 24th March 2017.
http://procontract.due-north.com
Additional Text:
The Council is using the e-procurement portal known as the Due North Pro-Contract portal https://procontract.due-north.com to conduct this procurement exercise.
To gain access to the Invitation to Tender document, please visit the above website. Tenderers will need to electronically submit an expression of interest and an electronic copy of the ITT will be sent as an attachment.
If you have any problems or queries gaining access to the Pro-Contract portal please contact The Service desk on 01670 597136 who are available between the hours of 08:30 and 17:30 Monday to Friday (excluding UK Public Holidays).
